msg: Make sure base is not null before checking for its contents.

author: tmiller
msg: re-activated the no dups filtering, dont know how

author: morten
msg: Major update for id() and key(). Patterns containing id() and key() are
now 100% supported (about time), and id() and key() expressions should
now work in all (at least most) combinations.

author: morten
msg: Removed a bad optimisation in the duplicate filter iterator.
